Learn how to use your handset correctly but also don't forget you can personalise your routine!

settings.title: Clean your face
settings.about_step: Gently wet your face with lukewarm water and use the Helloskin Makeup Remover Puffs to cleanse away makeup and impurities. Rinse with water and pat dry before moving on to the next step with your handset.

settings.title: Clean Mode
settings.about_step: After cleansing, switch your Helloskin Handset to Clean Mode. Place the provided cotton pad under the metal ring, reattach it, and apply Helloskin Cleanser. Glide gently across your skin for a deep clean and prep for the next steps.

settings.title: EMS Mode
settings.about_step: Switch your Helloskin Handset to EMS Mode with the Green Light setting. Apply Helloskin Vitamin C Serum to your face, then glide the handset gently across your skin to tone, brighten, and enhance collagen production for a radiant, firm look.

settings.title: Pulse Mode
settings.about_step: Switch your Helloskin Handset to Pulse Mode with the Red Light setting. Apply Helloskin Retinol Serum to your skin, then gently glide the handset over your face to boost absorption, reduce fine lines, and promote a youthful glow.

settings.title: Cold Mode
settings.about_step: Switch your Helloskin Handset to Cold Mode with the Blue Light setting. Apply Helloskin Hyaluronic Acid Serum to your face, then gently glide the handset over your skin to lock in hydration, soothe irritation, and calm redness for a refreshed, dewy look.

settings.title: Personalise your routine
settings.about_step: Remember, your Helloskin Handset routine can be tailored to suit your skinâ€™s unique needs. Mix and match modes, lights, and serums to create a personalised skincare experience that works best for you!

settings.title: Ice/Cold Mode
settings.text: Instantly cools the skin, tightening pores, reducing puffiness, and soothing irritation. Ideal for calming skin after sun exposure or when your skin needs a refreshing boost.

settings.title: EMS Mode
settings.text: Electrical Muscle Stimulation uses gentle micro-currents to stimulate and tone facial muscles. This mode helps lift and firm sagging skin, enhances facial contours, and promotes a more youthful, lifted appearance.

settings.title: Pulse Mode
settings.text: Delivers intermittent pulses to mimic a professional massage, penetrating deeply into the skin. This mode enhances product absorption, reduces tension, and revitalises skin, leaving it looking vibrant and refreshed.

settings.title: Clean Mode
settings.text: Utilises high-frequency vibrations to dislodge oil, dirt, and impurities from deep within the pores. Perfect for use with your favorite cleansing product or the included cleansing pads, this mode ensures a thorough, deep cleanse for smoother, clearer skin.

settings.title: Blue Light
settings.text: Effectively targets acne-causing bacteria, helping to reduce breakouts, inflammation, and acne scars. Use with any handset setting to calm irritated skin, prevent future breakouts, and maintain a clearer complexion.

settings.title: Red Light
settings.text: Stimulates collagen production to visibly reduce fine lines and wrinkles, resulting in firmer, more youthful skin. Whether you're using the EMS, Pulse, or Warm Mode, Red Light enhances skin elasticity and smoothness for lasting anti-aging results.

settings.title: Green Light
settings.text: Helps brighten skin, reduce hyperpigmentation, and even out skin tone by inhibiting melanin production. Paired with any setting, Green Light enhances skin brightness, leaving you with a radiant, glowing complexion.

settings.title: Anti-Aging Technology
settings.text: Reduces wrinkles and boosts elasticity for youthful skin.

settings.title: Deep Cleansing
settings.text: Lifts impurities and preps your skin for optimal results.

settings.title: Targeted LED Therapy
settings.text: Red, blue, and yellow lights to tackle aging, acne, and dullness.

settings.title: EMS Lifting
settings.text: Firms and tones facial muscles for a sculpted look.

settings.title: Hot & Cold Therapy
settings.text: Open pores with soothing heat, lock in hydration with cooling.

settings.title: Pulse Mode
settings.text: Enhances absorption of serums and moisturisers.

settings.text:

Turn back time with the V3 Handsetâ€™s advanced anti-aging technology. Red LED light, combined with EMS lifting, works to reduce wrinkles, improve elasticity, and firm sagging skin."

Key Benefits:

  • Reduces fine lines and wrinkles.
  • Boosts skin elasticity and collagen production.
  • Firms sagging skin for a more youthful appearance.

Whether itâ€™s crowâ€™s feet, smile lines, or dullness, this handset helps you achieve a smoother, younger-looking complexionâ€”effortlessly.

Pro Tip:Â Pair the V3 Handset with a high-quality retinol for maximum anti-aging benefits. Retinol enhances collagen production, refines skin texture, and reduces fine lines, making it the perfect companion to your daily glow routine.

settings.text:
Say hello to firmer, smoother skin with the V3 Handsetâ€™s collagen-boosting technology. Red light therapy penetrates deep into the skin to stimulate collagen production, helping to reduce fine lines, wrinkles, and sagging.

Key Benefits:

  • Enhances skin plumpness for a youthful glow.

Pro Tip:Â Combine Red LED Light Therapy with a nourishing collagen serum to supercharge your results. This powerful pairing helps replenish your skinâ€™s natural collagen reserves faster and more effectively.

settings.title: How often should I use the Helloskin Handset?
settings.content: We recommend using the handset daily for optimal results. However, you can personalise your routine based on your skinâ€™s needs and sensitivity.

settings.title: Can I use the handset with my current skincare products?
settings.content: Yes! The Helloskin Handset is designed to enhance the effectiveness of your skincare routine. However we found for the best results, pair it with Helloskin serums like Vitamin C, Retinol, or Hyaluronic Acid.

settings.title: Is the handset suitable for all skin types?
settings.content: Absolutely! The Helloskin Handset is gentle and effective for all skin types, including sensitive skin. With customisable modes and LED settings, you can tailor your experience to meet your skinâ€™s unique needs.

settings.title: What are the specifications of the handset?
settings.content:
The helloskin V3.0 handset is our most powerful and advanced device yet, designed for maximum effectiveness. 

Every handset undergoes a rigorous quality control process to ensure it meets the highest standards before being shipped. 

With upgraded technology and precision engineering, the V3.0 delivers enhanced results for all your skincare needs, combining cutting-edge features with durable, high-quality materials.

The handset face is made using 304 stainless steel steel material for a safe and skin friendly experience to last a lifetime!
A powerful battery capacity of 1000mAh
Rotation speed: 8000RPM
Temperature: 6Â°C Â± 5Â° (cool mode) and 42Â°C Â± 5Â° (warm mode)
Wavelengths: Red (620nm Â± 10nm), Blue (470nm Â± 10nm), Green (550nm Â± 10nm)
Full charge time: 2.5 hours

settings.title: Where do you ship from?
settings.content: All our products are stored locally in our warehouse in Australia, New Zealand, UAE & the US. We ship same day if you order before 2PM. No drop shipping here.

settings.content: Yes Absolutely! Our product is backed by our 30 day satisfaction guarantee and our 1 year warranty!
